mapper.select: select * from bookroom order by close_date desc
select * from (select bookroom.*, row_number() over(order by room_id desc) as num from bookroom) where num between #{start} and #{end}
select * from like_room join bookroom using(room_id)
select * from bookroom order by open_date
mapper.insert: insert into bookroom values( #{room_id}, #{room_title}, #{room_detail} , null, null, #{room_people}, default, sysdate, sysdate+14 , #{open_date}, #{close_date}, default, null, #{tag}, #{meet_week}, #{place} )
mapper.update: update bookroom set room_current = room_current+1 where room_id = #{room_id}
update bookroom set room_status = #{room_status} where room_id = #{room_id}
